00028 #ifndef __Particle_H__
00029 #define __Particle_H__
00030 
00031 #include "OgrePrerequisites.h"
00032 #include "OgreBillboard.h"
00033 
00034 namespace Ogre {
00035 
00051     class _OgreExport ParticleVisualData : public FXAlloc
00052     {
00053     public:
00054         ParticleVisualData() {}
00055         virtual ~ParticleVisualData() {}
00056 
00057     };
00058 
00060     class _OgreExport Particle : public FXAlloc
00061     {
00062     protected:
00064         ParticleSystem* mParentSystem;
00066         ParticleVisualData* mVisual;
00067     public:
00069         enum ParticleType
00070         {
00071             Visual,
00072             Emitter
00073         };
00074 
00076         bool mOwnDimensions;
00078         Real mWidth;
00080         Real mHeight;
00082         Radian rotation;
00083         // Note the intentional public access to internal variables
00084         // Accessing via get/set would be too costly for 000's of particles
00086         Vector3 position;
00088         Vector3 direction;
00090         ColourValue colour;
00092         Real timeToLive;
00094         Real totalTimeToLive;
00096         Radian rotationSpeed;
00098         ParticleType particleType;
00099 
00100         Particle()
00101             : mParentSystem(0), mVisual(0), mOwnDimensions(false), rotation(0), 
00102             position(Vector3::ZERO), direction(Vector3::ZERO), 
00103             colour(ColourValue::White), timeToLive(10), totalTimeToLive(10), 
00104             rotationSpeed(0), particleType(Visual)
00105         {
00106         }
00107 
00115         void setDimensions(Real width, Real height); 
00116 
00122         bool hasOwnDimensions(void) const { return mOwnDimensions; }
00123 
00125         Real getOwnWidth(void) const { return mWidth; }
00126 
00128         Real getOwnHeight(void) const { return mHeight; }
00129         
00131         void setRotation(const Radian& rad);
00132 
00133         const Radian& getRotation(void) const { return rotation; }
00134 
00137         void _notifyOwner(ParticleSystem* owner);
00138 
00141         void _notifyVisualData(ParticleVisualData* vis) { mVisual = vis; }
00142 
00144         ParticleVisualData* getVisualData(void) const { return mVisual; }
00145 
00147         void resetDimensions(void);
00148     };
00151 }
00152 
00153 #endif
